responsesCn.text: 由DOOH网络定义的单位，用于描述将在其上播放DOOH广告单元的物理设备。 对于基于位置的数字网络，大多数情况下，媒体单元是单个屏幕，但是在组合多个屏幕以描绘大于一个屏幕的内容的位置，整个屏幕组可以称为单个媒体 单元。

responses.text: A unit defined by the DOOH network, used to describe the physical device on which a DOOH ad unit will play. Most often for digital place-based networks, a media unit is a single screen, however in locations where multiple screens are combined to portray content that is larger than one screen, the entirety of the group of screens may be referred to as a single media unit.

Frequency represents the average exposure when used in conjunction with cumulative reach estimates, though it can also be reported on the basis of specific exposure levels when evaluated in the context of discrete reach estimates through frequency distribution analyses.

The net (unduplicated) count or percent of the defined universe of the target audience exposed to content, advertising, or a specific ad, in a Screen within a defined time frame. This time frame can be a day, week, or month, or even less-frequent time periods although more frequent reports are generally desirable to users. (Source: MRC Digital Place-Based Audience Measurement Standards Version 1)
The extent consumers are familiar with a brand or product.

question: What is 'viewable impression'?
questionCn: 什么是“可见的展示次数”

responsesCn.text: 在没有单独浏览器的DOOH中，可见的印象被视为一种看到的机会。 可见度标准是： 面向交通流的方向。 b。 使海报的两个边缘都可见。 C。 永远不能有超过10％的阻塞。 d。 如果海报具有专用照明，则仅在晚上（可见）会有观众。
在曝光后几天内可能会记住广告的估计人数。
广告包含在屏幕的可见空间中，位于全屏或部分屏幕的焦点对准的广告单元中，并且在可见空间和时间长度内符合预先确定的最小广告像素百分比 广告位于屏幕的可见空间中。 公认的是，具有可见广告印象的广告存在“看到的机会”，而投放的广告印象可能是这种情况，也可能不是。
看广告的总时间。

responses.text: In DOOH where there is no individual browser, a viewable impression is consider as an opportunity to see. Viewability criteria are: a. Be facing in the direction of the traffic flow. b. Have both edges of poster visible. c. Can never have more than 10% obstruction. d. Will only receive audience at night (be viewable) if the poster has dedicated illumination.
The estimated number of people likely to remember your ads within days of being exposed.

An ad was contained in the viewable space of the screen, it is in an in-focus ad unit that is either Full screen or Partial screen, and it meets pre-established minimum percent of ad pixels within the viewable space and the length of time the ad is in the viewable space of the screen. It is recognized that an “opportunity to see” the ad exists with a viewable ad impression, which may or may not be the case with a served ad impression.
Total number of time an ad is seen.

responsesCn.text: 一种度量单位，包括有机会看到（又称为流量），通知和停留时间的总人数，并根据媒体的有效长度进行校准。 也可以解释为通过数字户外显示或静态显示的人们很可能注意到一条消息的总次数。 该概念有时称为“可见性调整触点”或“ VAC”。
广告客户希望与其广告系列联系的特定群体。 目标受众是由某些属性或一组属性定义的（例如18-24岁的女性，跑车迷，新轿车的购物者购物市场）。
基于过去购买行为的资料，例如：哪些物品？ 什么时候？ 花了多少钱？
广告包含在屏幕的可见空间中，位于全屏或部分屏幕的焦点对准的广告单元中，并且在可见空间和时间长度内符合预先确定的最小广告像素百分比 广告位于屏幕的可见空间中。 公认的是，具有可见广告印象的广告存在“看到的机会”，而投放的广告印象可能是这种情况，也可能不是。

responses.text: A unit of measure that includes the total number of people with an opportunity to see (aka traffic), notice, and dwell time, calibrated to the media’s spot length. It can also be explained as the total number of times people passing a digital out-of-home display or static one are likely to notice a message. This concept is sometimes referred to as “Visibility Adjusted Contact”, or “VAC”.

A specific group that an advertiser seeks to reach with its campaign. Target audience is defined by a certain attribute or set of attributes (e.g. Women aged 18-24, Sports Car Lovers, Shoppers In-market for a New Sedan).
Profile based on past purchase behaviour, such as: What items? When? How much was spent?

An ad was contained in the viewable space of the screen, it is in an in-focus ad unit that is either Full screen or Partial screen, and it meets pre-established minimum percent of ad pixels within the viewable space and the length of time the ad is in the viewable space of the screen. It is recognized that an “opportunity to see” the ad exists with a viewable ad impression, which may or may not be the case with a served ad impression.

responsesCn.text: 是点击广告的用户与展示广告的次数之比。 这是监视广告系列效果的最基本形式。
广告印象是一次成功的广告调用-网页上加载的一个广告就是一次广告印象。 广告呼叫或广告请求是指一台计算机向另一台计算机请求广告。 这是一个通用术语，指的是广告请求。

是通常在网页顶部，底部或页边距运行的图形图像。 它基本上是页面上的广告空间。

responses.text: Is the ratio of users which have clicked on an ad over the number of times the ad has been displayed. This is the most basic form of monitoring the performance of a campaign.

An ad impression is one successful ad call – one ad loading on a webpage is one ad impression. An Ad Call or Ad Request is when one computer requests an ad from another. It is a generic term that refers to the request for an ad.
The estimated number of people likely to remember your ads within days of being exposed.
Is a graphic image that typically runs at the top, buttom or in the margein of a webpage. It is basically the ad space on a page.

responses.text: Is the ratio of users which have clicked on an ad over the number of times the ad has been displayed. This is the most basic form of monitoring the performance of a campaign.

Number of screen/poster/Lightbox/Banner… where the ad is displayed. e.g.  a double face iVision is two assets. A giant LED screen, a Lightbox, a scrolling panel, a banner or a poster is one asset.

question: What is 'served impression'?
questionCn: 什么是“投放的广告印象”

responsesCn.text: 广告包含在屏幕的可见空间中，位于全屏或部分屏幕的焦点对准的广告单元中，并且在可见空间和时间长度内符合预先确定的最小广告像素百分比 广告位于屏幕的可见空间中。 公认的是，具有可见广告印象的广告存在“看到的机会”，而投放的广告印象可能是这种情况，也可能不是。
在候机楼或机场内看到广告至少1次的人数，超过可以看到广告的总人数
该广告已开始在屏幕上呈现。 请注意，在绝大部分的DOOH体验中，所有广告（投放时）在整个播放过程中都是完全可见的。 在数字媒体世界中，该术语通常称为“播放”。
广告印象是一次成功的广告调用-网页上加载的一个广告就是一次广告印象。 广告呼叫或广告请求是指一台计算机向另一台计算机请求广告。 这是一个通用术语，指的是广告请求。

responses.text: An ad was contained in the viewable space of the screen, it is in an in-focus ad unit that is either Full screen or Partial screen, and it meets pre-established minimum percent of ad pixels within the viewable space and the length of time the ad is in the viewable space of the screen. It is recognized that an “opportunity to see” the ad exists with a viewable ad impression, which may or may not be the case with a served ad impression.
The population within the terminal or airport that sees at least 1 time the ad, over the total population that has the possibility to see the advertisement.

An ad that was reported to have begun to render at the screen. Note that in the vast majority of DOOH experiences, all ads (when served) are fully viewable for the entirety of the play. In the digital media world, this term is commonly known as a “play”.

An ad impression is one successful ad call – one ad loading on a webpage is one ad impression. An Ad Call or Ad Request is when one computer requests an ad from another. It is a generic term that refers to the request for an ad

responsesCn.text: 一种度量单位，包括有机会看到（又称为流量），通知和停留时间的总人数，并已根据媒体的有效长度进行校准。 也可以解释为通过数字户外显示屏的人们可能注意到一条消息的总次数。 该概念有时称为“可见性调整触点”或“ VAC”。
在任何地理上定义的市场中，一个评分点的成本。
网络设备覆盖的地理区域。

responses.text: A unit of measure that includes the total number of people with an opportunity to see (aka traffic), notice, and dwell time, calibrated to the media’s spot length. It can also be explained as the total number of times people passing a digital out-of-home display are likely to notice a message. This concept is sometimes referred to as “Visibility Adjusted Contact”, or “VAC”.
The cost of one rating point in any geographically defined market.
The geographic area covered by network installations.

An ad that was reported to have begun to render at the screen. Note that in the vast majority of DOOH experiences, all ads (when served) are fully viewable for the entirety of the play. In the digital media world, this term is commonly known as a “play”.

Acronym: GRP
